text:
Nfufu～...
Whenever I getta reveal a new costume at a live...

M'heart pounts and I get so excited～
Thinkin' 'bout how happy I'll be if everyone likes it!

It'll be fine. Afterall, it's a costume you yourself like,
and it looks great on you.

So I'm sure the fans will both that costume,
and you wearing it, Kogane.

Yea, I'm sure they will...!
Thanks, Producer.

Really, I'm very grateful an' all.
It's kinda frustrating that I can't express it well though～！

Your feelings are being conveyed, Kogane.
Thank you.

So, just like this,
Go express it to you fans as well- how you feel-  Kogane.

Everyone～! We are L'Antica!
We're gonna hit ya with everythin' we've got～!!

So y'all better not be holdin' nothin' back～!!!
So come make some noise～～!!!
